Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.chess.GameObject
        • games.chess.Piece

  • public class Piece
extends GameObject
    A chess piece

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean captured
      When the piece has been captured (removed from the board) this is true.
      int file
      The file (y) coordinate of the checker represented as a number [1-8].
      boolean hasMoved
      If the piece has moved from its starting position.
      Player owner
      The player that controls this chess Piece.
      java.lang.String rank
      The rank (x) coordinate of the checker represented as a letter [a-h].
      java.lang.String type
      The type of chess piece this is, either: 'King', 'Queen', 'Knight', 'Rook', 'Bishop', or 'Pawn'.

    • Field Detail

      • captured

        public boolean captured
        When the piece has been captured (removed from the board) this is true. Otherwise false.

      • file

        The file (y) coordinate of the checker represented as a number [1-8].

        If the piece has moved from its starting position.

        The player that controls this chess Piece.

        The rank (x) coordinate of the checker represented as a letter [a-h].

      • type

        public java.lang.String type
        The type of chess piece this is, either: 'King', 'Queen', 'Knight', 'Rook', 'Bishop', or 'Pawn'.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece()
        Creates a new instance of Piece. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public java.lang.String move(java.lang.String rank,
                    int file)
        Defaults the value for the optional arg 'promotionType' to '""'
        See Also:
        move(String, int, String)

      • move

        public java.lang.String move(java.lang.String rank,
                    int file,
                    java.lang.String promotionType)
        Moves the piece from its current location to the given rank and file.
        Parameters:
        rank - The rank (x) coordinate to move to. Must be [a-h].
        file - The file (y) coordinate to move to. Must be [1-8].
        promotionType - If this is a Pawn moving to the end of the board then this parameter is what to promote it to.
        Returns:
        The standard algebraic notation (SAN) representation of the move if successful, empty string otherwise. In addition if you fail your move you lose.
